title: Cedar Breaks National Monument: Carnivores
body: Carnivores        Long-tailed Weasel                          Red Fox This Red Fox was filmed in July 2010 at Cedar Breaks National Monument.   Duration:33 seconds               Badger (Taxidea taxus) Black Bear (Ursus americanus) Bobcat (Lynx rufus) Coyote (Canis latrans) Gray Fox (Urocyon cinereoargenteus) Long-tailed Weasel (Mustela frenata) Mountain Lion (Felis concolor) Red Fox (Vulpes fulva) Striped Skunk (Mephitis mephitis) Spotted Skunk (Spilogale putorius)
